name: NPR
text:
Mei Xiang, a panda at the National Zoo, could be having a cub soon. Veterinarians found what appear to be fetal tissue during an ultrasound.

"In the middle of a pandemic, this is a joyful moment we can all get excited about," said the chief veterinarian.
https://t.co/q0v9CcdSLA

name: NPR
text: Kenya's elephant population has more than doubled since the 1980s, and one national park is currently having a 'baby boom' thanks to a relief from drought — and the country's efforts to stop poachers. https://t.co/vUvI2wxEJF

name: NPR
text:
The success of Emi Mahmoud's slam poem "Mama" turned her into an international public figure. Since then, she's presented at the UN, joined White House round-table discussions with Obama and given TED Talks. 

Her next big goal? A career in medicine.
https://t.co/4cxYjQsoRH

name: NPR
text: The White House said President Trump's younger brother, Robert Trump, died on Saturday. https://t.co/ysZA7hU3lN

name: NPR
text:
When Jackie Summers launched Sorel Liqueur in 2011, he was the first Black person in the U.S. to hold a license to make liquor. 

“The entry to market is designed to be almost impenetrable,” he says. @hereandnow https://t.co/MIlIWCedxF

name: NPR
text:
In 2012, Kathleen Edwards gave up music and opened a cafe called Quitters Coffee. Now, after taking time to heal, she's back.

"I saved so much money in therapists in the first 20 years of my life as a songwriter, I just used it as my outlet," she says.
https://t.co/pykKSUXpue

name: NPR
text: Israel and the United Arab Emirates have agreed to forge a path toward normal diplomatic relations. Israel says as part of the agreement it will suspend its controversial plans to annex more territory in the West Bank. https://t.co/wL1N4vNU4i

name: NPR
text:
Jackson Ingalls was born into a basketball family. His mom won five state tournament titles as a coach. His dad played Division II basketball. 

But Jackson’s path looks a whole lot different.

“Since he was 10 he was saying, ‘I'm gonna ref for the NBA.’ ” https://t.co/6wDiK1uizs
